snippet.title: Summerland | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Summerland is an upcoming first-person narrative video game about morality and the afterlife directed by Conner Rush and developed by FYRE Games.  It tells the tale of Matthew, an ill detective in over his head who's desperate to protect what's most important to him.

Play Summerland for free on Steam and itch.io December 2, 2020.

Summerland is a primarily one man project created by high school student Conner Rush


Credits:
- A FYRE Games Production
- Summerland Directed and Programmed by Conner Rush
- Trailer Edited by Conner Rush
- Original Music by Auric Echoes
- Matthew Voiced by Rhys David
- Evelyn Voiced by Natalie Van Sistine

Learn more at our website: https://www.fyregames.com/

FYRE Games Instagram: https://instagram.com/fyre_games_offi...
FYRE Games Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/fyregamesr...
FYRE Games Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/pages/category...
